body.p: The carrying amount of deferred tax assets and liabilities may change even though there is no change in the amount of the related temporary differences. This can result, for example, from:

li.p: a change in tax rates or tax laws;
a reassessment of the recoverability of deferred tax assets; or
a change in the expected manner of recovery of an asset.

body.p: The resulting deferred tax is recognised in profit or loss, except to the extent that it relates to items previously recognised outside profit or loss (see paragraph 63).
